recipesJson.name: Fuji Butterscotch tobacco
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: My first attempt at a tobacco recipe. The tobacco is light,  and rich in flavor, but just enough for my taste buds. Iâ€™ve only had it steeping overnight so far and it taste pretty good. If you like it you can up the tobaccos. I will add more notes as it steeps.
